TextLibrary.Text: Search for the Archive in the Icarus, Navi and Degani Systems.
Search for the Archive in the Icarus, Navi and Degani Systems.
You must have 2000 Credits to purchase information about the Luminary Archive. Return when you have it.
Pay for information about the Luminary Archive on Degani VII.
2000 Credits subtracted. You now have the information.
